EmailTemplate.subject: Are you getting the latest product news and software updates?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Would you like to stay up-to-date on the latest HGuide product news? Are you registered to receive up-to-the-minute software updates? If not, please opt-in here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HGuide-sign-up.html]]>.
Best,
The HGuide Support Team
